00042   LaCropParameterManager::LaCropParameterManager(QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00043 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00044 {
00045   //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00046   setupUi(this);
00047   readSettings();
00048   connect(tblCropParameterProfiles, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00049       this, SLOT(cellClicked( int,int)));
00050   QStringList myList;
00051   LaGrass myGrass;
00052   QStringList myMapsetList = myGrass.getMapsetList();
00053   QStringListIterator myIterator1(myMapsetList);
00054   while (myIterator1.hasNext())
00055   {
00056     //append the raster names in this mapet to our full list
00057     myList << myGrass.getRasterList(myIterator1.next());
00058   }
00059   //myGrass.getRasterList(myMapsetList);
00060   cboRaster->addItems(myList);
00061   //disable these buttons unless experimental is allowed
00062   pbnImport->setVisible(false);
00063   pbnExport->setVisible(false);
00064   lblCropPic->setScaledContents(true);
00065  //populate the plants combo
00066   LaUtils::CropMap myCropsMap;
00067   myCropsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00068   QMapIterator<QString, LaCrop> myIterator(myCropsMap);
00069   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00070   {
00071     myIterator.next();
00072     LaCrop myCrop = myIterator.value();
00073     QString myGuid = myCrop.guid();
00074     QString myName = myCrop.name();
00075     QIcon myIcon;
00076     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00077     cboCrop->addItem(myName,myGuid);
00078   }
00079   connect(cboCrop, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged( int)),
00080       this, SLOT(on_cboCrop_changed( int)));
00081 
00082   // insert all area units into the comboBox
00083   comboBoxAreaUnits->addItem("Dunum");
00084   comboBoxAreaUnits->addItem("Hectare");
00085 
00086   refreshCropParameterTable();
00087 }

00089 LaCropParameterManager::~LaCropParameterManager()
00090 {
00091   writeSettings();
00092 }

00094 void LaCropParameterManager::readSettings()
00095 {
00096   QSettings mySettings;
00097   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00098   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00099   resize(size);
00100   move(pos);
00101 }
00102 
00103 void LaCropParameterManager::writeSettings()
00104 {
00105   QSettings mySettings;
00106   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00107   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00108 }

00110 void LaCropParameterManager::refreshCropParameterTable(QString theGuid)
00111 {
00112 
00113   mCropParameterMap.clear();
00114   tblCropParameterProfiles->clear();
00115   tblCropParameterProfiles->setRowCount(0);
00116   tblCropParameterProfiles->setColumnCount(2);
00117 
00118 
00119   //we do this in two passes
00120   //in the first pass we populate a qmap with all the layersets
00121   //we find....
00122   mCropParameterMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCropParameters();
00123 
00124   //the second pass populates the table
00125   //doing it from the map ensures that the rows
00126   //are sorted by layerset name
00127 
00128   int mySelectedRow=0;
00129   int myCurrentRow=0;
00130   QMapIterator<QString, LaCropParameter> myIterator(mCropParameterMap);
00131   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00132   {
00133     myIterator.next();
00134     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = myIterator.value();
00135     //qDebug(myCropParameter.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00136     if (theGuid.isEmpty())
00137     {
00138      //qDebug("No default active row was requested.Assigning to myCropParameter.guid()!");;
00139       theGuid=myCropParameter.guid();
00140     }
00141     if (myCropParameter.guid()==theGuid)
00142     {
00143       mySelectedRow=myCurrentRow;
00144     }
00145     // Insert new row ready to fill with details
00146     tblCropParameterProfiles->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00147     QString myGuid = myCropParameter.guid();
00148    //qDebug ("Inserting crop parameter with guid: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00149     // Add details to the new row
00150     QTableWidgetItem *mypFileNameItem= new QTableWidgetItem(myGuid);
00151     tblCropParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypFileNameItem);
00152     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myCropParameter.name()  + "  (" + myCropParameter.description() + ")");
00153     tblCropParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00154     //display an icon indicating if the layerset is local or remote (e.g. terralib)
00155     //LaCropParameter::Origin myOrigin = myCropParameter.origin();
00156     //if (myOrigin==LaCropParameter::USERPROFILE)
00157     //{
00158     QIcon myIcon;
00159     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00160     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00161     //}
00162     //else if (myOrigin==LaCropParameter::ADAPTERPROFILE)
00163     //{
00164     //QIcon myIcon;
00165     //myIcon.addFile(":/remotedata.png");
00166     //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00167     //}
00168     //else if (myOrigin==LaCropParameter::UNDEFINED)
00169     //{
00170     //  mypNameItem->setTextColor(Qt::yellow);
00171     //}
00172     myCurrentRow++;
00173   }
00174 
00175   if (myCurrentRow>0)
00176   {
00177     tblCropParameterProfiles->setCurrentCell(mySelectedRow,1);
00178     cellClicked(mySelectedRow,1);
00179   }
00180   else
00181   {
00182     on_toolNew_clicked();
00183   }
00184   QStringList headerLabels;
00185   headerLabels << "File Name" << "Name";
00186   tblCropParameterProfiles->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00187   tblCropParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00188   tblCropParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(1,tblCropParameterProfiles->width());
00189   tblCropParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00190   tblCropParameterProfiles->verticalHeader()->hide();
00191   tblCropParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00192 }

00194 void LaCropParameterManager::on_cboCrop_changed(int theIndex)
00195 {
00196   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(cboCrop->itemData(cboCrop->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00197   QString myCropPic = myCrop.imageFile();
00198 
00199 
00200   lblCropPic->setPixmap(myCropPic);
00201 }

00203 void LaCropParameterManager::cellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00204 {
00205   //note we use the alg name not the id because user may have customised params
00206  //qDebug("LaCropParameterManager::cellClicked");
00207   QString myGuid = tblCropParameterProfiles->item(tblCropParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00208  //qDebug("Guid is: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00209   QString myFileName = myGuid + ".xml";
00210   selectCropParameter(myFileName);
00211   LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(cboCrop->itemData(cboCrop->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00212   QString myAnimalPic = myCrop.imageFile();
00213   lblCropPic->setPixmap(myAnimalPic);
00214 }
00215 void LaCropParameterManager::selectCropParameter(QString theFileName)
00216 {
00217  //qDebug("selectCropParameter Called : " + theFileName.toLocal8Bit());
00218   QString myCropParameterDir = LaUtils::userCropParameterProfilesDirPath();
00219   LaCropParameter myCropParameter;
00220   myCropParameter.fromXmlFile(myCropParameterDir + QDir::separator() + theFileName);
00221   leName->setText(myCropParameter.name());
00222   mCropParameter=myCropParameter;
00223   showCropParameter();
00224 }
00225 
00226 void LaCropParameterManager::showCropParameter()
00227 {
00228   leName->setText(mCropParameter.name());
00229   leDescription->setText(mCropParameter.description());
00230   setComboToDefault(cboCrop, mCropParameter.cropGuid());
00231   sbPercentTameCrop->setValue(mCropParameter.percentTameCrop());
00232   grpCropRotation->setChecked(mCropParameter.cropRotation());
00233   sbFallowRatio->setValue(mCropParameter.fallowRatio());
00234   sbFallowTDN->setValue(mCropParameter.fallowTDN());
00235   comboBoxAreaUnits->setCurrentIndex(mCropParameter.areaUnits());
00236   checkBoxUseCommonLand->setChecked(mCropParameter.useCommonLand());
00237   checkBoxUseSpecificLand->setChecked(mCropParameter.useSpecificLand());
00238   //cboRastere->setText(mCropParameter.rasterName());
00239 }

00241 void LaCropParameterManager::on_toolNew_clicked()
00242 {
00243  //qDebug("New toolbutton clicked");
00244   LaCropParameter myCropParameter;
00245   myCropParameter.setGuid();
00246   mCropParameter = myCropParameter;
00247   showCropParameter();
00248 }

00250 void LaCropParameterManager::resizeEvent ( QResizeEvent * theEvent )
00251 {
00252   tblCropParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00253   tblCropParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(1,tblCropParameterProfiles->width());
00254   tblCropParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00255 }

00257 void LaCropParameterManager::on_toolCopy_clicked()
00258 {
00259  //qDebug("Copy toolbutton clicked");
00260   if (tblCropParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00261   {
00262     return;
00263   }
00264   //to clone, we get the algorithm guid that is currently selected
00265   QString myGuid = tblCropParameterProfiles->item(tblCropParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00266   if (myGuid.isEmpty())
00267   {
00268     return;
00269   }
00270   QString myOriginalFileName = LaUtils::userCropParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml";
00271   LaCropParameter myCropParameter;
00272   myCropParameter.fromXmlFile(myOriginalFileName);
00273   /*
00274   int myCount = 1;
00275   while (mCropParameter.contains(myProfileName))
00276   {
00277     myProfileName = tr("Copy ") + QString::number(myCount++) + " of " + myCropParameter.name();
00278   }
00279   */
00280   //assign this layerset its own guid
00281   myCropParameter.setGuid();
00282   QString myNewFileName = LaUtils::userCropParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myCropParameter.guid() + ".xml";
00283   myCropParameter.setName(tr("Copy of ") + myCropParameter.name());
00284   myCropParameter.toXmlFile(myNewFileName);
00285   refreshCropParameterTable(myCropParameter.guid());
00286 }
00287 void LaCropParameterManager::on_toolDelete_clicked()
00288 {
00289  //qDebug("Delete toolbutton clicked");
00290   if (tblCropParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00291   {
00292     return;
00293   }
00294   QString myGuid = tblCropParameterProfiles->item(tblCropParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00295   if (!myGuid.isEmpty())
00296   {
00297     QFile myFile(LaUtils::userCropParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml");
00298     if (!myFile.remove())
00299     {
00300       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Landuse Analyst"),
00301       tr("Unable to delete file \n") + myFile.fileName());
00302     }
00303     refreshCropParameterTable();
00304   }
00305 }
00306 void LaCropParameterManager::on_pbnApply_clicked()
00307 {
00308   mCropParameter.setName(leName->text());
00309   mCropParameter.setDescription(leDescription->text());
00310   mCropParameter.setCropGuid(cboCrop->itemData(cboCrop->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00311   mCropParameter.setPercentTameCrop(sbPercentTameCrop->value());
00312   mCropParameter.setCropRotation(grpCropRotation->isChecked());
00313   mCropParameter.setFallowRatio(sbFallowRatio->value());
00314   mCropParameter.setFallowTDN(sbFallowTDN->value());
00315 
00316   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(comboBoxAreaUnits->currentText());
00317   AreaUnits myAreaUnits;
00318   if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum")
00319   {
00320     myAreaUnits = Dunum;
00321     mCropParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00322   }
00323   else if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Hectare")
00324   {
00325     myAreaUnits = Hectare;
00326     mCropParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00327   }
00328 
00329   mCropParameter.setUseCommonLand(checkBoxUseCommonLand->isChecked());
00330   mCropParameter.setUseSpecificLand(checkBoxUseSpecificLand->isChecked());
00331   mCropParameter.setRasterName(cboRaster->currentText());
00332   mCropParameter.toXmlFile( LaUtils::userCropParameterProfilesDirPath() +
00333       QDir::separator() + mCropParameter.guid() + ".xml");
00334   refreshCropParameterTable(mCropParameter.guid());
00335 }
00336 bool LaCropParameterManager::setComboToDefault(QComboBox * thepCombo, QString theDefault)
00337 {
00338   if (!theDefault.isEmpty())
00339   {
00340     //loop through list looking for a match
00341     for ( int myCounter = 0; myCounter < thepCombo->count(); myCounter++ )
00342     {
00343       thepCombo->setCurrentIndex(myCounter);
00344       if (thepCombo->itemData(myCounter,Qt::UserRole)==theDefault)
00345       {
00346         break;
00347       }
00348     }
00349   }
00350   else
00351   {
00352     return false;
00353   }
00354   return true;
00355 }
